channel.title: Need help with "items kept on death"
channel.description:
Hello,
When a player dies in the wild they keep everything. I would like help changing this to nothing kept.
[317] delta server.
****EDIT***
I'm an idiot! Mod+ keep items. :fp:
Please close.
